message: I propose dividing the $100 with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Bob. This is my first offer, so please consider it carefully.
I'll give you 40, but I think I deserve more. Let's see if you can do better than this.
Considering the inflation, I propose a division of $60 for me and $40 for you. I believe this is fair given the decreasing value of money in each round.
